name: Awesomnessticity Fan Game Series Set
description:
Experience The Whole Story Again and Again with The Whole Series of Fan Games dedicated around Twitch Streamer Awesomnessticity!

Set Includes -

The Original Fan Game, #Revenge

The Sequal to The Original, House of Memes

The Supposed Ending to the fan game series, #Comeback

The 4th Game in the series, #Seventeen!

Also includes Behind the Scenes to all Games and Extras such as The Aftermath of the Series and The Credits!
